title: New: Swim Deep – Beach Justice
content:
With Swim Deep‘s debut, (I think), single out in a matter of weeks, the band have dropped the single’s b-side. I’m going to go out on a limb and say, I actually like it more than the King City. It’s a remarkably more somber affair, sprinkles of organ elevate the track, with the line “you’ll never know what love is” avoiding the cliché and settling more comfortably in the realms of ‘understatedly moving’. A much better realm if you ask me.

Beach Justice is the B-side to King City out May 14th.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
